insert into TA_JC_HUANJIE_SUPERVISE_INFO (supervise_info_id,business_id,receive_org_name,supervise_type_no,supervise_result_no,supervise_time,supervise_descript,supervise_gist,warning_content,opinion_id,rule_id,feedback_endtime,state,last_updatetime,rule_version,org_id,revocation_reason,start_time,end_time,status,promise_limit,out_days,batch_id,tbcx_times)

mapper.select:
select
from TA_JC_HUANJIE_SUPERVISE_INFO JOIN v_org t2 ON TA_JC_HUANJIE_SUPERVISE_INFO.org_id=t2.ID JOIN TA_SP_RESULT_OPINION T3 ON T3.OPINION_ID=TA_JC_HUANJIE_SUPERVISE_INFO.OPINION_ID
